Mifune performs a powerful strike, quickly drawing his [[Kurosawa|sword]] and cutting through his opponent. His opponent only feels the attack as Mifune resheaths his sword.

== Trivia ==
* During the animation of this technique, the screen goes black and white, likely in reference to [[Wikipedia:Samurai cinema|old samurai movies]].
* When written as {{translation|生きる|Ikiru}}, it means "to live, to exist".
